dialogue: Hey, Steve. I'm just calling to let you know...I’m ready.
-sigh- And what am I supposed to be apologizing for?
You called me just to troll me, dude. It really hurt my feelings.
Let's not get caught up on who trolled who. Are you going to apologize?
Uh huh. Sure. I'm sooooo sorry that on your millionth annoying, pointless call, I took the outrageous step of saying your name, which was apparently enough to make you turn into a little baby.
Thanks, Steve. That really means a lot to me.
I hang up. What a class act. Sure, sometimes he screws up, but he always knows exactly what to say to make it right.
